scripts.tauri: cd src-tauri && npm exec tauri dev
scripts.tauri:build: cd src-tauri && npm exec tauri build
scripts.tauri:dev:vlc: cd src-tauri && bash -lc "source ../scripts/env_vlc.sh && npm exec tauri dev"
scripts.tauri:dev:win: cd src-tauri && set LIBVLC_LIB_DIR=C:\Program Files\VideoLAN\VLC&& set LIBVLC_INCLUDE_DIR=%LIBVLC_LIB_DIR%\sdk\include&& set PATH=%LIBVLC_LIB_DIR%;%PATH%&& npm exec tauri dev
scripts.tauri:dev:linux: cd src-tauri && export LIBVLC_LIB_DIR=/usr/lib&& export LIBVLC_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/include&& export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LIBVLC_LIB_DIR:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH&& export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=$LIBVLC_LIB_DIR/pkgconfig:$PKG_CONFIG_PATH&& npm exec tauri dev
